page.title: 09CUSTOMS 2 BRAE
page.content: BRAE UP_HELLY_AA. thinking up their acts.Each squad has to submit the details of the squad to the Up_helly_aa committee to make sure no two squads are the same. The squads march from the Brae hall to the Sailing club there the galley is pushed into the voe.The brass band play ,a cheer goes up.The squads gather round the galley.They throw the torches into the ship as she floats out into the voe. The squads now pile into their buses and make for the halls.At a hall each squad takes its turn to perform.After the act the squad picks a dance.Then the squad travels on to the next hall. there are five different halls open on Up_helly_aa night.It is a long night the festivities go on to the early hours of the morning.
